name: KUNOICHI FG [test]
description:
TO PLAY OPEN FIGHTING GAME THEORY.EXE

Hi,

I am a young game dev and i am currently trying to create a fighting game.

I worked on this project for 2 days.

So this game is just a test not a real game. but you may like it!

The AI is basic it can only Block and parry.

USe ESCAPE to quit the game.

Here the controls:

Q and D are the Directionnal input. [Go forward and backward]

You can jump with SPACE BAR.

Attacks buttons:

S to block

Num 7

Num 9 [ special]

Num 4

Num 5

Num 6

Num 6 [ special]

Num 1

Num 2

Num 3

M 

N [a kind of grab ]
